alert.note: Alert for Morgan County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 9:12PM MST until January 06 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Fort Morgan, and Akron. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 8 AM MST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 3 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen. Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. Roads will likely become slick and hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
